Texts.Eng: Bring ^orange;3 Thornitox Seeds^reset; to the yellow Avian at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;
My ^orange;Xeno Lab^reset; is on the fritz, and I need 3 ^orange;Thornitox^reset; seeds for a client or I don't eat this month! Can you help me out?

Texts.Chs: 非常感谢你。虽然礼轻，但请拿上我扫描^green;古代科技指南^reset;得到的数据。也许你能用上。
Texts.Eng: Thanks so much. It's not much, but take this data I uncovered by scanning ^orange;Technology of the Ancients^reset;. Maybe you can make use of it.
